mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(B.ID) FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON M.EMAIL = B.EMAIL

SELECT B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.CONTENT , B.EMAIL , B.VIEW_CNT , TO_CHAR(B.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(B.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT , B.FILE_NAME , B.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , B.IP_ADDR , M.NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON M.EMAIL = B.EMAIL ORDER BY B.ID DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , S.* FROM (SELECT B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.CONTENT , B.EMAIL , B.VIEW_CNT , TO_CHAR(B.CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(B.MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT , B.FILE_NAME , B.ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , B.IP_ADDR , M.NAME FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON M.EMAIL = B.EMAIL ORDER BY B.ID DESC) S /*CDATA 내부의 텍스트는 원문 그대로 출력하게 한다.*/ WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageNo} + 1) * #{listSize} /*조회 끝 번호*/) WHERE RNUM >= #{pageNo} * #{listSize} + 1 /*조회 시작 번호*/
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (ID , SUBJECT , CONTENT , EMAIL , VIEW_CNT , CRT_DT , MDFY_DT , FILE_NAME , ORIGIN_FILE_NAME , IP_ADDR) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_PK.NEXTVAL , #{subject} , #{content} , #{email} , 0 , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , #{fileName} , #{originFileName} , #{ipAddr})
